parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: if locationId input null in params, auto get all group from this user

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: type == null or == 0, get Device by uuid else type == 1, get Device item by mac

get.summary: Get User's list entire devices or devices in a location
get.description: locationId = undefined then return list entire devices

post.summary: Get userId by puid or email
Verify Email OTP (password forget | sign up verify)
Send email reset password for user

post.description: Activate a smart by smid and locId

get.summary: Get all states by location UUID
Get single state by location UUID and MAC device
Get one share entity by owner
Get one share entity by shared user
Get all share entities by owner
Get all share entities by shared user
Get all share accesses by owner
Get all share accesses by shared user

info.title: ROGO Open Api Admin Controller
info.description: These API contains information about Rogo open api for working with end users

x-header-apikey.name: x-header-apikey
x-header-apikey.description: x-header-apikey get from Project in project Dashboard

type.description: if type is null, default = 0, if not null, type is only value between 0 - 1

mac.description: macaddress or uuid or id String unique - non null - unique in system

cdev.description: classify device - int - default is 0 (real device), 10 ir device,

username.description: required when `needVerifyEmail` in project is true

command.description: Command details as an array where the first element is the attribute and the rest are values

shareKey.description: Generated key for decoding locationId, userId, etc.

type.description: Type of share (e.g., dev, smart, etc.)

subType.description: Subtype of share (loc for all devices in a location, dev for separate device)

filterId.description: Filter ID, typically the location ID

toUserId.description: User ID to whom access is shared

byUserId.description: User ID who shared the access

command.description: Command details as an array where the first element is the attribute and the rest are values

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the status was last updated
